Uses of Interface
com.javadocking.drag.painter.DockableDragPainter

Packages that use DockableDragPainter
com.javadocking.drag Contains the functionality for dragging a Dockable from one Dock and docking it into another dock. 
com.javadocking.drag.painter Contains the functionality for painting a representation of the Dockable, when it is dragged. 
 

Uses of DockableDragPainter in com.javadocking.drag

Classes in com.javadocking.drag.painter that implement DockableDragPainter
 class CompositeDockableDragPainter
           
 class ImageDockableDragPainter
           This dockable drag painter shows a window with the image of the dockable at the current mouse position, when the dockable is dragged.
 class LabelDockableDragPainter
          This dockable drag painter shows a window with the title of the dockable at the current mouse position, when the dockable is dragged.
 class OldWindowDockableDragPainter
          A dockable drag painter that only paints the dockable when the new dock is a FloatDock.
 class SwDockableDragPainter
           This painter paints a Dockable during dragging.
 class TransparentWindowDockableDragPainter
           A dockable drag painter that only paints the dockable when the new dock is a FloatDock.
 class WindowDockableDragPainter
          A dockable drag painter that only paints the dockable when the new dock is a FloatDock.
